subcategory.name: Category Previews
subcategory.description: Ecommerce category preview examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS category preview components to highlight various product categories, and help customers find out what products are available in your store. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

components.name: Three-column with description
components.imageCreditsHtml: Images provided by Ugmonk
components.iframeHtml:
Shop by Collection

Each season, we collaborate with world-class designers to create a collection inspired by the natural world.

Handcrafted Collection

Keep your phone, keys, and wallet together, so you can lose everything at once.

Organized Desk Collection

The rest of the house will still be a mess, but your desk will look great.

Focus Collection

Be more productive than enterprise project managers with a single piece of paper.
